info.name: üöÄ ULTIMATE Logo Maker API - Complete Feature Set
info.description:
# üé® ULTIMATE Logo Maker API Collection

## üåü Complete Feature Set
This is the most comprehensive Postman collection for the Logo Maker API, including **ALL** possible features:

### ‚ú® Core Features
- **Multi-layer Logo Creation**: Background, Text, Shape, Icon, Image layers
- **Template System**: Categories, templates, and inheritance
- **Asset Management**: Cloudinary integration for all file types
- **Version Control**: Snapshot-based undo/redo system
- **Export Options**: PNG and SVG export with customizable dimensions
- **Advanced Layer Properties**: Position, scale, rotation, opacity, blend modes, shadows

### üåç Localization Support
- **English (EN)** and **Arabic (AR)** language support
- **RTL Support** for Arabic content
- **Localized Messages** and error responses
- **Date Formatting** per language
- **Query Parameter & Header** language detection

### üé® Advanced Design Features
- **Gradient Legacy Formats**: Linear, radial, and complex gradients
- **Shape Src Properties**: Custom SVG paths and asset references
- **Text Properties**: Complete typography control with gradients
- **Blend Modes**: 16 different blend modes for layers
- **Shadow Effects**: Advanced shadow configurations
- **Stroke Options**: Multiple stroke styles and alignments

### üì± Mobile Integration
- **Mobile Endpoints**: Optimized for mobile applications
- **Structured Responses**: Mobile-friendly data formats
- **Responsive Design**: Scale factor and relative positioning
- **Thumbnail Generation**: Multiple size options

### üóÇÔ∏è Library Management
- **Background Library**: Raster and vector backgrounds
- **Icon Library**: SVG icons with dynamic coloring
- **Asset Upload**: File upload with metadata
- **Category System**: Organized asset management

### üîß Advanced API Features
- **Version Control**: Logo versioning and snapshots
- **Template System**: Reusable logo templates
- **Export Formats**: PNG, SVG, JPG, WebP
- **Quality Control**: DPI and quality settings
- **Responsive Scaling**: Multiple scaling methods
